jobs.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain scalable, robust, and performant frontend applications using React, TypeScript, and CSS

  • Translate designs from Figma into complex layouts and animations

About You:

  • Strong general engineering ability: writing modular, maintainable code within a complex codebase

  • Deep understanding of modern React and TypeScript concepts

  • Expertise in responsive and adaptive design principles

  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

  • Able to work in-person in Singapore
jobs.descriptionPlain:
Key Responsibilities:

 - Develop and maintain scalable, robust, and performant frontend applications using React, TypeScript, and CSS

 - Translate designs from Figma into complex layouts and animations

About You:

 - Strong general engineering ability: writing modular, maintainable code within a complex codebase

 - Deep understanding of modern React and TypeScript concepts

 - Expertise in responsive and adaptive design principles

 - Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail

 - Able to work in-person in Singapore

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, and optimize all layers of the Hyperliquid protocol stack. This includes consensus, execution (HyperCore and HyperEVM), and API/RPC servers.

  • Design and implement financial and trading primitives on the Hyperliquid L1

About You:

  • Very strong systems engineering ability: writing modular, maintainable code within a complex codebase, where correctness and performance are critical

  • Interest in performance optimization

  • Strong first principles thinker

  • Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and communication skills

  • Competitive programming experience (e.g., IOI, ICPC) or similar level of programming ability

  • Experience with Rust

  • Able to work in-person in Singapore
jobs.descriptionPlain:

 - Design, implement, and optimize all layers of the Hyperliquid protocol stack. This includes consensus, execution (HyperCore and HyperEVM), and API/RPC servers.

 - Design and implement financial and trading primitives on the Hyperliquid L1
